name: Successions
description:
* made in 100 hours for #ExtraCreditsGameJam3 | theme: CYCLES *

*Witness the birth and rise of a nation from an oaktree's perspective during a 211 year lifecycle simulation, which YOU control! 

*And be CAREful of the 4 elements (water/rain, fire/heat, earth/minerals, air/freshness), because if you don't live your life in harmony with the environment, one of you is going to perish.

*Simulation speed adjustable from 1hour/sec to 1month/sec
